hints.content:
The number line shows $\maroonD{4}$ equal jumps of $\blueD{3}$ units.

![The same number line with each arrow labeled, plus 3](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/81871b4b0671bb81a82107316ea3408aea2166bc)

options.explanation:
$\maroonD{4}\times\blueD{3}=\maroonD{4}\blueD{\text{ threes}}$.

That's the same as $\maroonD{2}\blueD{\text{ threes}}+\maroonD{2}\blueD{\text{ threes}}$.

![The same number line with a brace spanning the first 2 arrows labeled, 2 threes, and a brace spanning the other 2 arrows labeled, 2 threes](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b5b79b8a9e6d1354d7d46e0aab0968451e9c5336)

$\redD{6}+\purpleC{6}=\greenD{12}$

So $\maroonD{4}\times\blueD{3}=\greenD{12}$.
